mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PRGRM_APP pa JOIN PROFESSER_CONSULTATION pc ON pa.stud_no = pc.stud_no JOIN CSL_APPLY ca ON pa.stud_no = ca.stud_no WHERE pa.stud_no = #{userNo};
SELECT s.STUD_NO, s.REAL_STUD_NO, s.C_CD, s.GEN_CD, s.STUD_NM, s.BIRTHDAY, s.ST, s.MBR_TELNO, u.USER_NO, u.email FROM STUD_INFO s JOIN USERS u ON u.USER_NO = s.STUD_NO WHERE s.STUD_NO = #{userNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM USERS s WHERE s.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND s.pw = #{password}
mapper.update: UPDATE USERS SET pw = #{password} WHERE user_no = #{userNo}
